EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_AppSphere_Q414.Follow Up
EmailTemplate.subject: AppSphere - A Pivotal Thanks!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for joining us in our booth at AppSphere in Las Vegas!
- Discover how AppDynamics makes it easy to monitor Java apps running on Cloud Foundry and Pivotal Web Services here <http://blog.pivotal.io/cloud-foundry-pivotal/products/monitoring-java-apps-appdynamics>. - Learn more about Pivotal CF <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-cf>®, the world’s leading enterprise Platform-as-a-Service powered by Cloud Foundry here <http://www.gopivotal.com/platform-as-a-service/pivotal-cf>. - Get a free 60 day trial <run.pivotal.io/? utm_source=AppDynamics&utm_medium=email&utm_term=appdynamics&utm_content=FollowUp&utm_ campaign=Appdynamics%20Followup> to see how easy it is to use AppDynamics with Pivotal Web Services for a best in class Java experience - Go deeper - sign up to attend a free workshop as part of the Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow>. You’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal’s CF platform. Coming soon to a city near you!
Finally, If you have any questions or would like a Pivotal representative to contact you, please email <mailto:info@pivotal.io>us or visit our contact page <http://pivotal.io/contact>.
Thanks! The Pivotal Team
